fields.name: ArchiveWindowLength
fields.description: ISO 8601 time between 1 minute to 25 hours to indicate the maximum content length that can be archived in the asset for this live output. This also sets the maximum content length for the rewind window. For example, use PT1H30M to indicate 1 hour and 30 minutes of archive window.

fields.name: AssetName
fields.description: The asset that the live output will write to.

fields.name: Created
fields.description: The creation time the live output.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the live output.

fields.name: Hls
fields.description: HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) packing setting for the live output.

fields.name: LastModified
fields.description: The time the live output was last modified.

fields.name: ManifestName
fields.description: The manifest file name. If not provided, the service will generate one automatically.

fields.name: OutputSnapTime
fields.description: The initial timestamp that the live output will start at, any content before this value will not be archived.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state of the live output.

fields.name: ResourceState
fields.description: The resource state of the live output.

fields.name: RewindWindowLength
fields.description: ISO 8601 time between 1 minute to the duration of archiveWindowLength to control seek-able window length during Live. The service won't use this property once LiveOutput stops. The archived VOD will have full content with original ArchiveWindowLength. For example, use PT1H30M to indicate 1 hour and 30 minutes of rewind window length. Service will use implicit default value 30m only if Live Event enables LL.
